text:
LATEST ONE DIRECTION NEWS, VIDEOS AND PICTURES ON THE BOYS

Is Simon Cowell set to become a £460million talent scout? Britain's Got Talent judge is 'in talks with' Universal to find new music acts as he returns to his roots Simon Cowell is considering a return to his roots and is in talks about taking a job as a talent scout for Universal Music Group, sources claim. The Britain's Got Talent judge - who closed down his own business Syco Entertainment earlier this year - has apparently been in discussions with Lucian Grainge, the chief executive at Universal whose acts include Rihanna , Sam Smith and Take That. The move would put the 62-year-old, worth an estimated £460 million, in direct competition with his previous employer Sony, where he carved out a career as an artists and repertoire (A&R) executive, signing major acts such as Westlife. As the creator of The X Factor, the hugely successful ITV talent show, he discovered One Direction, Leona Lewis and Little Mix. He also backed Susan Boyle on Britain's Got Talent....read Is Simon Cowell set to become a £460million talent scout?

5 Seconds of Summer reveal details of their secret upcoming album after releasing 'Complete Mess' single 5 Seconds of Summer have recorded their 'most personal album' to date. 5 Seconds of Summer reveals details of their secret upcoming album

Louis Tomlinson cancels shows in Moscow and Kyiv over 'needless war' and says his thoughts 'are with the people of Ukraine' The former One Direction singer, 30, is touring to support his debut LP Walls, which was released shortly before the coronavirus pandemic overwhelmed the globe on January 31, 2020. Louis Tomlinson cancels shows in Moscow and Kyiv over 'needless war'

Liam Payne 'asked X Factor stylist Grace Woodward to sit on his lap when he was just 17' - after she slammed the show's 'dark misogyny' Grace Woodward, who worked as the fashion director on the ITV show in 2010, claimed the One Direction star began paying more attention to her when she was linked to contestant Matt Cardle. Liam Payne 'asked X Factor stylist to sit on his lap'

Bella Hadid opts for a laid back look in black top and trousers while sister Gigi cradles daughter Khai, 18 months, as they arrive in Milan for fashion week Gigi, 26, brought her daughter Khai, 18 months, who she shares with former One Direction star Zayn Malik, and cradled her in her arms as they left the airport. Bella and Gigi Hadid arrive in Milan for fashion week

Pregnant Lottie Tomlinson reveals she's expecting a baby boy with boyfriend Lewis Burton as they share sweet gender reveal video Lottie Tomlinson, 23, has revealed she is expecting a baby boy with with her partner Lewis Burton, 29, in a gender reveal video. Pregnant Lottie Tomlinson shares sweet gender reveal video

Niall Horan falls 'extremely ill' and 'vomits violently' on BA flight to London ahead of RTE Late Late Show appearance The former One Direction star, 28, took to social media to thank staff on his British Airways flight for 'taking good care of him' on the plane. Niall Horan reveals he became 'extremely ill' during a flight

Louis Tomlinson goes casual in a gray sweatsuit as he watches the Celtics play the Detroit Pistons from his courtside seat in Boston The 30-year-old One Direction member was taking it easy as he watched the Detroit Pistons narrowly defeat the Boston Celtics at the TD Garden in Boston on Wednesday night. Louis Tomlinson goes casual in gray sweats at a Celtics-Pistons game

Liam Payne gives a rare insight into his family life as he reveals that his 'devious' son Bear, 4, pretended to have Covid to 'get the day off school' Liam Payne has revealed that his son Bear has figured out how to 'get the day off school' in a question and answer session on Friday. Liam Payne gives a rare insight into his family life with son Bear

Moment Louis Tomlinson stopped his Washington concert so a fan could be carried out amid shoving and chaos - just three months after Astroworld tragedy Louis Tomlinson halted his show in Washington D.C. on Thursday night so a fan who passed out could be carried from the premises, with video showing him urging fans to back up. Louis Tomlinson stops his concert 'so a fan can be carried out'

Gigi Hadid shares a rare photo of her daughter Khai, 17 months, wearing a denim jacket with her name written on the back in cursive Gigi Hadid let her more than 72 million Instagram followers get a look this Thursday at a sweet jacket she got for her little girl. She shares her one-year-old daughter Khai with her ex Zayn Malik. Gigi reveals she has gotten Khai, one, a jacket with her name on it

Lottie Tomlinson reveals her ultimate beauty secrets and when she feels the most confident and sexy: 'It makes me feel like the best version of myself' The 23-year-old makeup artist and influencer revealed her ultimate beauty secrets and when she feels the most confident, in an interview with Daily Mail Australia. Lottie Tomlinson reveals when she feels the most confident and sexy

EXCLUSIVE: Loved-up Harry Styles continues his 28th birthday celebrations by taking girlfriend Olivia Wilde to London gallery where actress fawns over nude artwork Harry Styles continued his 28th birthday celebrations by taking Hollywood actress girlfriend Olivia Wilde to a London art gallery. Harry Styles takes girlfriend Olivia Wilde to London art gallery

Louis Tomlinson brings his gig to a halt after spotting a fan who had fainted in the audience before kindly giving her HIS water to drink The former One Direction singer, 30, brought his gig to a halt on Wednesday night after spotting that a fan had fainted in the audience before kindly giving her his water to drink. Louis Tomlinson gives fan HIS water after seeing her faint at his gig

In for a penny, in for £200,000! Rare Edward VIII coin is to be sold for huge sum... to thousands of collectors The copper 1d piece was due to be issued widely from 1937. But plans were abandoned in December 1936 following the abdication crisis which resulted in Edward relinquishing the throne. In for a penny, in for £200K! Edward VIII coin to be sold for huge sum

Zayn Malik shows off his symbolic neck inking and extensive tattoo collection in pouty snap as he ditches his beard for a clean shaven look The former One Direction star, 29, showed off his neck tattoo on Instagram on Tuesday evening, after previously unveiling the artwork in October. Zayn Malik shows off his symbolic neck tattoo in pouty snap

Harry Styles is dogged by rumours he's set to perform at Glastonbury 2022 for the first time after landing Coachella headliner Harry Styles has been dogged by rumours he is set to perform at Glastonbury this year for the first time. Harry Styles is dogged by rumours he's set to perform at Glastonbury

PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Shirtless Niall Horan shares a passionate kiss with bikini-clad girlfriend Amelia Woolley as One Direction star romances the fashion buyer at lavish Mexican resort Niall Horan could barely keep his hands off his girlfriend Amelia Woolley on Wednesday when the pair lapped up the sunshine poolside during their luxury Cabo getaway. PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Niall Horan shares a kiss with Amelia Woolley

Maude Apatow reacts to video of her interviewing One Direction as a 14-year-old on The Tonight Show Before discussing her hit HBO series Euphoria, Maude Apatow took a walk down memory lane, reacting to video of herself at 14... freaking out before interviewing One Direction. Maude Apatow reacts to video of her interviewing One Direction

One Direction star and Derby fan Niall Horan backs calls for the government to help save the Rams as legal claims from Middlesbrough and Wycombe threaten to force the troubled club out of business Singer-songwriter and Rams fan, Niall Horan, has turned to his 41 million Twitter followers to lend support to his club in its time of need, retweeting a link to a petition calling on Government to intervene. One Direction's Niall Horan backs calls for the ministers to aid Rams

Harry Styles and Gemma Chan transform into superheroes as actress shares behind-the-scene snaps on the set of Eternals The former One Direction star, 27, who plays Starfox in the Marvel film, looked in good spirits as he posed with the actress, 39, in full costume. Gemma Chan poses with Harry Styles while on the set of Eternals

Zayn Malik sports a VERY different look as he rocks a bushy new beard and longer hair in rare selfie... after he was spotted on plus size dating app The former One Direction star, who turned 29 years old on Wednesday, looked brooding in the snap as he looked of camera while wearing circular lensed sunglasses. Zayn Malik sends fans wild as he sports a huge beard in a rare selfie

PR firm got stars to back music chief who won CBE in New Year's Honours EXCLUSIVE: Leaked emails reveal the behind-the-scenes work carried out in an attempt to secure a knighthood for Rob Stringer - the record boss who signed Adele and One Direction to Columbia. PR firm got stars to back music chief who won CBE in New Year Honours

Zayn Malik signs up to plus size dating app to find 'curvy and fuller women' - three months after Gigi Hadid split The former One Direction star, 28, joined the site which describes itself as an 'inclusive' platform for 'curvy people to find and enjoy love.' Zayn Malik signs up to plus size dating app after Gigi Hadid split

Just call me Quack-maninoff! Echo the world record-breaking duck shows off her musical talents A dynamic duck which can perform amazing tricks including playing the piano while quacking has astounded her proud owner. Just call me Quack-maninoff! Echo the duck shows off her piano skills

Liam Payne puts on an animated display as he takes his on-again fiancée Maya Henry on a date to Winter Wonderland The One Direction singer, 28, couldn't contain his excitement as he was strapped in on one of the rides next to a stoney-faced Maya, 21. Liam Payne puts on an animated display at Winter Wonderland

Goodbye - and thanks for putting up with my humongous ego! According to a new poll in The Sun, ten per cent of the British public hope to find me in their Christmas stocking, compared to 11 per cent who want One Direction star Harry Styles. PIERS MORGAN: Goodbye and thanks for putting up with my humongous ego!

Everyone wants Harry's Styles! Singer's non-binary cosmetic brand including £15 nail polish and £27 serum is ALREADY selling out even though it's only available for pre-order Pleasing, Harry Styles's hotly anticipated beauty line, is currently available for pre-order and will be on general sale from November 29. The line include a lip and eye pen, nail polish and a serum. Harry Styles is releasing an inclusive makeup brand called Pleasing

'I want a loyal and honest partner': Hailee Steinfeld models some VERY racy ensembles as she details what she wants from a relationship... after accusing ex Niall Horan of cheating The singer, 24, revealed that she wants a partner who is 'first and foremost loyal and honest' as she detailed what she wants out of a relationship in a new interview with Cosmopolitan . Hailee Steinfeld reveals she wants a 'loyal and honest' partner

Zayn Malik RETURNS to Instagram for first time since Yolanda Hadid altercation and Gigi split but avoids the scandal in brooding promo post The former One Direction star, 28, took to the photosharing site on Thursday to post a smouldering image to plug his collaboration with clothing giant Arnette Zayn Malik RETURNS to Instagram for first time since Yolanda row

'They're at the end of their tether': Liam Payne 'dropped by his management due to concerns over his partying' The One Direction singer, 28, has reportedly been dropped by his management company amid concerns over his partying lifestyle. Liam Payne 'dropped by management due to concerns over his partying'

Aussie radio star Jackie 'O' Henderson recalls her 'uncomfortable' interaction with Zayn Malik - as his dispute with ex Gigi and her mother Yolanda ramps up She said on Tuesday's Kyle and Jackie O Show that she and co-host Kyle Sandilands had noticed Zayn's gloomy demeanour after interviewing One Direction in Australia several years ago Jackie O recalls her 'uncomfortable' interaction with Zayn

Maya Henry gazes lovingly at boyfriend Liam Payne as Texan model leaves a friend's birthday celebration arm-in-arm with One Direction star The temperamental couple, who rekindled their relationship over the summer after 'taking time apart,' appeared to be in high spirits while exiting luxury Leicester Square hotel The Londoner. Maya Henry gazes lovingly at boyfriend Liam Payne

Harry Styles dresses down in scruffy jeans and a hoodie after his elaborate stage get up including performing as Dorothy from The Wizard Of Oz The former One Direction star left dinner with his pals in the Tribeca area after putting on a show-stopping performance over the weekend. Harry Styles dresses in scruffy jeans after elaborate performances

Harry Styles dons blue gingham dress and red tights as he transforms into Dorothy from The Wizard Of Oz while performing at his Harryween party in NYC The singer, 27, dressed as Dorothy Gale from The Wizard Of Oz at his Harryween fancy dress party at Madison Square Garden in New York City on Saturday. Harry Styles dresses as Dorothy Gale from The Wizard Of Oz

Zayn Malik vows to 'fight with every ounce of his body' to avoid a custody battle with Gigi Hadid over their 13-month daughter Khai after dispute with the model's mother Yolanda The couple, who share 13-month-old daughter Khai, have reportedly called it quits in the wake of claims that the singer 'struck' reality star Yolanda Hadid, 57, during an altercation at the Pennsylvania home. Zayn Malik vows to 'fight' to avoid a custody battle with Gigi Hadid

'Your respectful king punched your mom in the face': Jake Paul trolls Gigi Hadid over allegations of altercation between Zayn Malik and Yolanda Jake Paul a mocked Gigi Hadid over reports her ex Zayn Malik assaulted her mom Yolanda during a dispute. ake Paul trolls Gigi Hadid over fight between Zayn Malik and mom

'Karma comes after everyone': Zayn Malik's sister Waliyha throws her support behind the singer after he denied hitting his girlfriend Gigi Hadid's mother Yolanda Writing that the One Direction star is 'so loved' by his family, Walihya, 22, alluded to Yolanda's accusations by noting that 'the universe would serve you the revenge that you deserve.' Zayn Malik's sister Waliyha throws her support behind the singer

Gigi Hadid's mother Yolanda Hadid claims Zayn Malik STRUCK her and 'is considering filing a police report' as former One Direction star DENIES claim saying it was just 'harsh words' Gigi Hadid's mother Yolanda Hadid claims that Zayn Malik 'struck' her and she's considering filing a police report, per TMZ, but the former boybander has denied the claims in a twitter response Gigi Hadid's mother Yolanda Hadid claims Zayn Malik STRUCK her

Gwyneth Paltrow tells Drew Barrymore that Harry Styles joining the MCU 'makes me want to dip my toe back into the Marvel Universe' Gwyneth Paltrow might be on board to reprise her role as Pepper Potts now that Harry Styles has joined the Marvel Cinematic Universe. She made an appearance on Drew's News on Friday. Gwyneth Paltrow ponders MCU comeback after Harry Styles casting

Zayn Malik shows off his array of new arm and neck tattoos as he poses in white T-shirt for rare selfie The former One Direction star, 28, sported brand new tattoos on his neck while he also appeared to have added to his arm inkings. Zayn Malik shows off his array of new arm and neck tattoos

Liam Payne puts on a cosy display with a leggy Maya Henry as the pair match in designer outfits at Versace event Liam Payne and Maya Henry were not afraid to pack on the PDA on Friday as they attended the Frieze and Versace party in London on Friday. Liam Payne puts on a cosy display with a leggy Maya Henry

Maya Henry puts on a glamorous display in a sheer black lace jumpsuit as she heads to a swanky restaurant party at Isabel in London Maya Henry, 21, showcased her chic style as she stepped out to the swanky Isabel restaurant party in London in a sheer black lace jumpsuit on Tuesday night. Maya Henry puts on a glamorous display in a sheer black lace jumpsuit

Harry Styles opts for a laidback look in yellow polo shirt and electric blue trousers as he enjoys a round of golf with Carolina Hurricanes ice hockey players on break from his US tour Harry Styles took a break from his tour on Monday to enjoy a round of golf with Carolina Hurricanes players at Old Chatham Golf Club in North Carolina. Harry Styles enjoys a round of golf with Carolina Hurricanes players

Olivia Wilde is every bit the supportive girlfriend as she carries along Harry Styles tote bag while out in LA... while he is on US tour The 37-year-old actress supported her 27-year-old musician boyfriend by carrying along a beige tote bag from his Love On Tour while out in Los Angeles on Wednesday. Olivia Wilde carries Harry Styles tote bag in LA

Harry Styles admits X-rated meaning behind his hit Watermelon Sugar... teasing how the saucy track is 'about the sweetness of life' During the concert, Styles prefaced the performance of the song by directly addressing his fans and gave a little bit of insight into the thoughts and intentions that went into the track. Harry Styles admits X-rated meaning behind his hit Watermelon Sugar

Olivia Wilde showcases toned abs in sports bra and matching leggings after hitting gym in... while boyfriend Harry Styles is on tour The 37-year-old actress-turned-director showed off her gym-honed physique after leaving a workout in Los Angeles on Monday afternoon. Olivia Wilde showcases toned abs in sports bra after hitting gym

Niall Horan cuts a dapper figure in a gold sweater and leather jacket as he leaves glitzy Versace x Fendi afterparty during Milan Fashion Week Niall Horan cut a dapper figure as he departed from the the Versace x Fendi afterparty in Milan, Italy on Sunday. Niall Horan looks effortlessly suave as he attends MFW afterparty

PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Maya Henry flashes a mystery ring as she joins Liam Payne at Vas J Morgan's LFW party... but Texan model's £3million engagement ring is STILL missing Maya Henry flashed a mystery ring as she joined Liam Payne at Vas J Morgan's LFW partyin Notting Hill on Thursday... but Texan model's £3million engagement ring was still missing. PICTURE EXCLUSIVE: Liam Payne and Maya Henry put on a cosy display

'I've spoken to Louis about it': Liam Payne reveals talks for a One Direction reunion will happen 'sooner rather than later' The singer, who performed at a star-studded charity concert for The Wanted's Tom Parker on Monday, revealed he had spoken to his former bandmate Louis Tomlinson about the band's future. Liam Payne reveals 1D reunion will happen 'sooner rather than later'

Zayn Malik, 28, is seen walking into his NYC apartment ahead of daughter Khai's first birthday... as Gigi's sister Bella Hadid and Dua Lipa are also spotted After months without any glimpses of the pop star, Zayn Malik was seen going into his NYC apartment over the weekend. The singer was in an all black getup and a fresh high top fade haircut. Zayn seen for first time in months walking into his NYC apartment

Wipeout! Bouncy dog floors visitor when he tries to fool her during a game of fetch Nelli the German shorthaired pointer was playing fetch with her owner's friend Declan on the driveway of her house in Kennebunkport, Maine. VIDEO: Dog knocks people over during a game of fetch

Zayn Malik slams Simon Cowell, raps 'f*** the QUEEN' and says he 'beat Kanye West by breaking wind' in shock lyrics from new album The former One Direction Star, 28, who didn't join his girlfriend Gigi Hadid at the Met Gala on Monday, will foray into rap in his upcoming album. Zayn Malik slams Simon Cowell and raps 'f*** the QUEEN' on new album

Robert Lewandowski proved you can NEVER keep a good man down with a beautiful assist against England... John Stones and Harry Maguire had limited him to pot shots before injury-time intervention DOMINIC KING AT THE NARODOWY STADIUM: Attention to detail is something Gareth Southgate advocates so Stones and Maguire would have known how to shackle Lewandowski. Robert Lewandowski proved you can never keep a good man down

Lottie Tomlinson shows off her svelte figure as she strips down to a string bikini top and shorts for day in the sun Lottie Tomlinson, 23, enjoyed the early September heatwave as she stripped down to a black bikini top and shorts on Tuesday. Lottie Tomlinson shows off her svelte figure in black bikini top

EXCLUSIVE: 'He's showing so much strength': Liam Payne reveals he offered his support to The Wanted's Tom Parker following his brain tumour diagnosis after 'silly rivalry' The One Direction star revealed he reached out to The Wanted hitmaker, after he announced he had been diagnosed with stage four Glioblastoma in October. Liam Payne reveals he offered his support to The Wanted's Tom Parker

Olivia Wilde proves to be the supportive girlfriend as she attends opening night of Harry Styles: Love On Tour in Las Vegas Olivia Wilde attended her boyfriend Harry Styles' Las Vegas tour as the former One Direction siner kicked off his tour last night. The actress was spotted in a white pantsuit that accentuated her neckline. Olivia Wilde at opening of Harry Styles: Love On Tour in Las Vegas

Niall Horan looks dapper in a mustard suit as he puts on a loved-up display with stunning girlfriend Mia Woolley at Horan & Rose charity gala in London Niall Horan put on a loved-up display with his girlfriend Mia Woolley on Friday as they posed up a storm for photographers at a charity event, raising money for The Black Heart Foundation. Niall Horan puts on loved-up display with Mia Woolley at charity gala

Derek Brunson hoping to lead Darren Till in a merry dance in Las Vegas as UFC veteran bids to put himself in prime position for a rematch with rival Israel Adesanya EXCLUSIVE INTERVIEW BY OLLIE LEWIS: Brunson is reflecting on another crossroads moment in his life, where he turned his back on a burgeoning cheerleading career to pursue wrestling. Brunson hoping to lead Till in a merry dance in Las Vegas
